option.name: Cortana Hack
option.info: Sort Cortana in front of other transparent geometry

option.name: Use Demo UI
option.info: Uses alternate UI collection for demo

string128.name: Comment
string128.info: sorry, this doesn't parse correctly in Eschaton 0.8.1 :(

short.name: Desired Permutation
short.info: if non-zero, will try to use model permutations which end in this number, eg. '7' would pick 'body-7' and 'head-7'

short.name: Desired Permutation
short.info: if non-zero, will try to use model permutations which end in this number, eg. '7' would pick 'body-7' and 'head-7'

short.name: Desired Permutation
short.info: if non-zero, will try to use model permutations which end in this number, eg. '7' would pick 'body-7' and 'head-7'

option.name: Slayer Default
option.info: vehicle will spawn when the default vehicle set is used in a Slayer game

option.name: CTF Default
option.info: vehicle will spawn when the default vehicle set is used in a CTF game

option.name: King Default
option.info: vehicle will spawn when the default vehicle set is used in a KOTH game

option.name: Oddball Default
option.info: vehicle will spawn when the default vehicle set is used in an Oddball game

option.name: Slayer Allowed
option.info: vehicle can spawn in a Slayer game

option.name: CTF Allowed
option.info: vehicle can spawn in a CTF game

option.name: King Allowed
option.info: vehicle can spawn in a King of the Hill game

option.name: Oddball Allowed
option.info: vehicle can spawn in an Oddball game

short.name: Desired Permutation
short.info: if non-zero, will try to use model permutations which end in this number, eg. '7' would pick 'body-7' and 'head-7'

option.name: Initially at Rest
option.info: Doesn't Fall

option.name: Does Accelerate
option.info: Moves Due to Explosions

short.name: Desired Permutation
short.info: if non-zero, will try to use model permutations which end in this number, eg. '7' would pick 'body-7' and 'head-7'

option.name: Initially at Rest
option.info: Doesn't Fall

option.name: Does Accelerate
option.info: Moves Due to Explosions

short.name: Desired Permutation
short.info: if non-zero, will try to use model permutations which end in this number, eg. '7' would pick 'body-7' and 'head-7'

option.name: Opened By Melee Attack
option.info: note: instant effect, suddenly snaps to open position upon melee contact

short.name: Desired Permutation
short.info: if non-zero, will try to use model permutations which end in this number, eg. '7' would pick 'body-7' and 'head-7'

short.name: Desired Permutation
short.info: if non-zero, will try to use model permutations which end in this number, eg. '7' would pick 'body-7' and 'head-7'

short.name: Desired Permutation
short.info: if non-zero, will try to use model permutations which end in this number, eg. '7' would pick 'body-7' and 'head-7'

struct.name: Decals
struct.info: note: these chunks may not be in their expected order

short.name: Manual BSP Index
short.info: Structure BSP Index that this encounter belongs to; ignored unless 'manual bsp index specified' flag is checked; if not checked, will try to find this automatically, but may fail in areas of overlapping geometry.

float.name: Respawn Delay: from
float.info: delay between respawning actors in this encounter

float.name: Respawn Delay: to
float.info: delay between respawning actors in this encounter

enum16.name: Initial State
enum16.info: state that this actor starts in

enum16.name: Return State
enum16.info: state that this actor will return to when it has nothing to do

enum16.name: Unique Leader Type
enum16.info: what kind of leader this squad has; Normal = based upon squad size; Random will always choose one

short.name: Normal Difficulty Count
short.info: initial number of actors on normal difficulty

short.name: Insane Difficulty Count
short.info: initial number of actors on insane difficulty; hard is midway between normal and insane

short.name: Respawn Minimum Actors
short.info: must be at least this many actors alive at once, else will instantly respawn more

short.name: Respawn Maximum Actors
short.info: there will never be more than this many actors alive at once

float.name: Respawn Delay: from
float.info: delay between respawning actors in this squad

float.name: Respawn Delay: to
float.info: delay between respawning actors in this squad

char.name: Sequence ID
char.info: 0 = no sequence; identifies this move position as belonging to a sequence; only actors whose starting locations match this sequence can use it

char.name: Sequence ID
char.info: 0 = no specific sequences; which move position sequence we can use

enum16.name: Change Attacking or Defending Status When...

short.name: Manual BSP Index
short.info: Structure BSP Index that this encounter belongs to; ignored unless 'manual bsp index specified' flag is checked; if not checked, will try to find this automatically, but may fail in areas of overlapping geometry.

option.name: Stop if Death
option.info: actor aborts if any participant dies

option.name: Stop if Damaged
option.info: actor aborts if he's damaged

option.name: Stop if Visible Enemy
option.info: actor aborts if they see an enemy

option.name: Stop if Alerted to Enemy
option.info: actor aborts if they suspect an enemy

option.name: Player Must Be Visible
option.info: only when they can SEE an enemy

option.name: Stop Other Actions
option.info: stop to chat

option.name: Keep Trying to Play
option.info: if fails initially, will keep testing to see when it can play

option.name: Player Must Be Looking
option.info: only starts when player looks at a participant

float.name: Trigger Distance
float.info: player must be this far away before conversation can trigger

float.name: Run-to-Player Distance
float.info: if 'involves player' flag is set, conversation participants will run this close to the player before speaking

option.name: Optional
option.info: conversation can continue without participants

option.name: Has Alternate
option.info: if nobody found, use what's flagged 'is alternate', ie. radio chatter

option.name: Is Alternate
option.info: only used if someone 'has alternate'

index.name: Use This Object
index.info: if a unit with this name exists, we try to pick them to start the conversation

index.name: Set New Name
index.info: once we pick a unit, we name it this

float.name: Up Time
float.note: entered number about 57 = count in seconds
